title: Remove principal ID and avatar option from profile interface

requirements.summary: Remove principal ID display field/section from ProfilePage component
acceptanceCriteria: Principal ID is no longer visible in the ProfilePage UI
Any labels, text fields, or copy buttons related to principal ID are removed
Profile page layout adjusts properly without the principal ID section

file_operations.description: Remove the principal ID display section including any labels, copy buttons, or text fields that show the user's Internet Identity principal. Ensure the layout remains visually balanced after removal.

requirements.summary: Remove avatar URL input field and related UI elements from ProfilePage
acceptanceCriteria: Avatar URL input field is removed from the profile form
Avatar-related labels, placeholders, and helper text are removed
Profile form no longer sends or updates avatar data when saving changes
Form validation and submission logic handles the absence of avatar field correctly

file_operations.description: Remove the avatar URL input field and all related UI elements (labels, placeholders, helper text). Update the profile update mutation call to exclude avatarUrl from the payload. Ensure form validation and submission logic work correctly without the avatar field.

requirements.summary: Remove principal ID display from MobileMenu profile section
acceptanceCriteria: Principal ID is not shown in the mobile menu profile section
User profile display in mobile menu shows only display name
Layout remains visually balanced without principal ID

file_operations.description: Remove any principal ID display from the profile section in the mobile menu. Ensure only the display name is shown and that the layout remains visually balanced.

requirements.summary: Replace avatar images with display name initials or placeholder icons
acceptanceCriteria: Avatar images are no longer fetched or displayed from avatar URLs
Profile displays use initials or placeholder icons instead of custom avatars
All avatar-related image loading logic is removed or disabled

file_operations.description: Replace any avatar image rendering with display name initials or a simple placeholder icon. Remove avatar image fetching and loading logic.
Replace any avatar image rendering with display name initials or a simple placeholder icon. Remove avatar image fetching and loading logic.
If the Header displays user avatar in any menu or profile button, replace it with display name initials or a placeholder icon. Remove avatar image loading logic.

Replace avatar images in the online users list with display name initials or placeholder icons. Remove avatar-related image loading logic while preserving the rest of the online users display functionality.
